t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Hello again, my Majesty. I want to tell you something.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You came in too quickly. What's going on here?

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Did you think defeating my mother would turn off the spell?

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: It didn't work. Reimu tried cutting her hair only for it to grow back!

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Haha! There's no way to turn it off unless you meet with my mother again.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm officially going to try again and convince her to turn off the spell.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm going to slow you down in the process!
